text_1_facilitator.eng: In order to practise giving instructions that work, we all need to work on turning our negative instructions into positive ones.

quiz_1_question.eng: Click on each of the negative commands to see how they can be restated as a positive instruction.

quiz_1_option_1_text.eng: "Stop fighting with your siblings over toys!"

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: "Please take turns with toys! Each of you can have 5 minutes."

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: "Please speak with a quiet, indoor voice."

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: "Please keep your food on the plate."

rows.quiz_1_feedback_1: "Please take turns with toys! Each of you can have 5 minutes."
rows.quiz_1_feedback_2: "Please speak with a quiet, indoor voice."
rows.quiz_1_feedback_3: "Please keep your food on the plate."
